name: Knysna Hollow

reviews.text: The rooms: We stayed in one of the beautiful garden chalets and were thrilled by its size, decor, cleanliness and amenities. The king bed was new and comfortable and the bathroom was huge and very well appointed with a double enclosed shower. The vaulted ceiling exposes the beautiful thatch roof and the grounds were well tended.
reviews.title: A very lovely little hotel

reviews.text: The restaurant: The food and ambience were outstanding, don't know what else to say.
reviews.title: Old fashioned charm … but not for us

reviews.text: The bar: A very warm and inviting space. When we arrived in the evening, the bar seemed to be a lively place with young local couples and guests of all ages.
reviews.title: We loved it
Luxury chalets for a great price
reviews.text: Conclusion: I would definitely stay here again. I wish I had taken more photos, but didn't really think about it.

description: Located just outside the picturesque town of Knysna, Knysna Hollow Country Estate offers comfortable accommodation and friendly service in lush and tranquil surrounds. Three swimming pools, a first-class restaurant offering contemporary Cape cuisine with an extensive wine list and a relaxed environment all combine for a memorable holiday for the whole family.
